name: Burned Land
description:
Burned Land is a 4x game in which you will take control of a nascent human race and try to avoid its extinction.
Build, explore, conquer until you are worthy of gods. Then confront their anger.Advanced management of the populationThe population is one of your main resources, your people will be fed, educated, trained and armed. He will model himself according to your laws and choices, events and his own plans. Fanaticism, inequalities, revolts are all plagues that could lead your civilization to the end.A living and evolving worldThe other races will react to your growth, trade, destroy or assimilate, all your actions will have repercussions. The world will keep the scars of your actions, confrontations and decisions.Gods attentive to your evolutionAt first indifferent to your existence, the gods will follow with interest the evolution of your power. Break the balance of the world and provoke their anger. If they fail to exterminate you, put an end to their reign.Total freedom and infinite replayabilityManage your people and their problems in your corner, explore the world in search of powerful artifacts, destroy all life on the planet, defy the elements and the gods. You are master of your destiny.
